attributes.action: Scotland to have a voice within the EU
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farage backtracked on the £350 million for the NHS on live television. The Country is being played by a corrupt Government which must stop. Scotland is being run by this Government which will bleed other nations dry and cause more homeless, racism, anxiety and confusion among the people within the UK. This needs to stop and Scotland, Wales and NI must have a voice within the UK instead of England only.
attributes.background: Scotland to have it's own voice and not referred to as the 'little people' which we have for centuries by England. Not all of Scotland, England, Northern Ireland and Wales voted to exit the EU. This was caused by a Government whom made wrong choices and now caused racism, fear and meltdown of the UK
